A frontend that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
A backend that connects to an external PostgreSQL database using environment variables: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp
User registration functionality with account creation and validation
User login functionality with authentication and session management
Search functionality for bus and railway tickets with filters for date, time, origin, and destination
Real-time display of seat availability and pricing for selected routes
Secure payment processing integration for ticket purchases
Booking confirmation system that sends notifications via email or SMS
User dashboard displaying booking history and past transactions
Ticket printing functionality for confirmed bookings
Responsive design that adapts to both mobile and desktop devices
All page backgrounds configured with snow theme
All UI components styled with dim gray color scheme
Repository package.json configured with npm run install:all to install both frontend and backend dependencies
Repository package.json configured with npm run dev to start both frontend and backend concurrently
